info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued April 27 at 12:57PM MDT until April 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southeastern Otero County in south central New Mexico... Northwestern Hudspeth County in western Texas... Eastern El Paso County in western Texas...
* Until 600 PM MDT.
* At 1256 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over Tornillo.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong winds up to 40 mph.
SOURCE...Department of Transportation Traffic Cameras.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 34 and 62.
Locations impacted include... Cornudas Mountains, Tornillo, Cornudas, Agua Dulce, Dairyland, Lincoln National Forest, Indian Cliffs Ranch, Crow Flats, Loma Linda, Fabens, Clint, Butterfield, Hueco Mountain Estates, Sparks, San Elizario, Horizon City, Socorro, Lake Way Estates, Hueco Mountain Wind Ranch, and Desert Haven.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Otero, NM; El Paso, TX; Hudspeth, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Otero, NM; El Paso, TX; Hudspeth, TX
